text.14: With more than 10 years in the market, Beautysalon has already conquered clients from many countries with its exclusive and totally natural treatments.
text.16: Complete therapy for scalp and strands, protecting all types of hair, including long and fine ones.
text.18: Our team is full of renowned professionals, famous for launching trends with differentiated and classic cuts.
text.20: The beautysalon has several natural and totally vegan treatments for any hair type.
text.21: Testimonials from those who have been here
text.22: “I've been a Beautysalon customer for 5 years and I won't change it fornothing! Certainly my hair changed a lot after I started only deal with natural and vegan products. They are amazing and qualified professionals.
